newsitem.title: LUXEMBOURG: EU should borrow to finance public works - Delors.
newsitem.headline: EU should borrow to finance public works - Delors.

text.p: The European Union should borrow to fund a big programme of public works to boost growth and employment, former European Commission president Jacques Delors said in an interview published on Monday.

"The launch of big infrastructure projects would allow the single market to become competitive, for people to move about more freely and more cheaply...," Delors, who has been advising France's new Socialist-led government, told Belgian daily Le Soir.
Asked how Europe would find the money to fund the projects, he said, "The Union can borrow. It is not much in debt."

France's Socialist party said during the election campaign which swept it to power this month that central bank reserves could be used to guarantee borrowing in the euro zone to finance infrastructure projects.
